ValidationRule.description: Nomination process cannot be done on Registered client
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT($User.BypassVR__c ) && ISCHANGED(NominationStatus__c) && ( ISPICKVAL(rsvpState__c, 'Registered') || ISPICKVAL(rsvpState__c, 'Declined') ) && $Profile.Name = "ICON_SA Manager" && $Profile.Name = "ICON_SAManager_EVERYWHERE" && $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator" && $Profile.Name <> "System Admin_Corporate" && $Profile.Name <> "LV_Club"
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Nomination process cannot be done on Registered client
